@title Lynx Toolkit Document model
@description Example file
@keywords document model, wiki, syntax, example
@syntax owiki

Lynx Toolkit Document model
===========================

Introduction
------------
- Simplified document model influenced by HTML and FlowDocument
- Should be easy to write parsers and formatters for it

### Supported parsers
- OWiki
- Markdown*
- Creole*
- XHtml*

\* Not complete

### Supported formatters
- OWiki
- Markdown
- Creole
- Confluence
- Codeplex wiki
- XHtml
- FlowDocument

### OWiki syntax
1. Easy to parse
2. Easy to read source code

Influenced by Markdown and Creole.

Examples
--------
### Headers
OWiki uses Markdown syntax.

### Paragraphs

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,

### Horizontal ruler
- - -   

### Emphasized (italic) text
Lorem *ipsum* dolor sit amet

### Strong (bold) text
Lorem **ipsum** dolor sit amet

### Links
[http://www.google.com]  
[http://www.google.com|google]  
[http://www.google.com|google|search with google]

### #name1 Anchors
Anchor defined #name2 in text
[#name1|Go to anchor]

### Images
{image.png}  
{image.png|alternative text}  
{image.png|alternative text|http://www.google.com}

### Special characters
(C)/(c) Copyright  
(R)/(r) Registered trademark  
(TM)/(tm) Trademark  
3>2 Greater than  
2<3 Less than  
& is not Ampère's and  
... Ellipsis  
<-> -> <- Arrows  
<=> => <= Double arrows  
1024x768 or 1024 x 768  
Long dashes: -- ---

### Smileys
:) :( :P :D ;)

### Symbols
(*) (i) (/) (x) (!) (+) (-) (?) (_) (y) (n) (on) (off) (h)

### Escaped characters
\*Not emphasized\*  
\*\*Not bold\*\*  
\[Not link|not link]  
\- - -  
\### Not a header  
\- Not a list  
\1. Not a ordered list  
\||Not a table|  
\|Not a cell|
